cards.title: Self-taught
cards.text: I'm a person who loves learning new technologies and doing projects with said technologies.

cards.title: ITLA
cards.text: It's the most prestigious institute in my country in terms of technology and here I took the software development technology.

cards.title: Talendig Bootcamp
cards.text: I took this bootcamp because I wanted to learn more about web development and here I learned HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node, and more.

cards.title: Platzi
cards.text: I did the web development school on this platform, where I learned Fundamentals HTML, CSS, Javascript also React and Node.

cards.title: FreeCodeCamp
cards.text: I decided to take some bootcamps on this platform because of its prestige and I took Web Responsive Design, Javascript Algorithms and Data Structures and Backend Development and Apis.

freelace.title: Freelance
freelace.text: I currently work as a freelance, where I have worked with different clients, developing web pages and applications.

government.title: General Directorate of Public Procurement
government.text: I currently work as a Frontend Developer at the General Directorate of Public Procurement, where I have developed web applications for the institution.

talendig.title: Talendig
talendig.text: I worked as a Full Stack Developer at Talendig, a company that offers bootcamps to train people in the technology industry.

quotes.title: Quote
quotes.quote: “First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.”
quotes.author: John Johnson

paragraphs.years: years old, with an insatiable thirst for knowledge. Currently, I'm immersed in my education at the Instituto Tecnológico de las Américas, where I'm acquiring the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in the world of technology. But my learning doesn't stop in the classroom; I'm an avid self-learner, always seeking opportunities to learn more and push boundaries.
paragraphs.learning: However, my learning doesn't end in the classroom; I'm an avid self-learner, always seeking opportunities to learn more and push boundaries. In addition to my education and work at the General Directorate of Public Procurement since December 2022, I'm also a passionate freelancer and software developer. Working independently allows me to apply my skills and knowledge to a variety of exciting projects, and I enjoy collaborating with different clients and companies to deliver customized technological solutions.
paragraphs.mission: Technology is my true passion, and my mission is to utilize my skills as a software developer to create innovative solutions that enhance people's lives.
